com.epam.jmp.taskmanager.data.pool

Interface IPool<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - Connection type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPool, ConnectionPool, FilePool

    public interface IPool<S>
    Interface which create contract for pool objects
